verses.verse: נִדְרַ֙שְׁתִּי֙ <S%H1875><s%> I am sought לְל֣וֹא <S%H3808><s%> not שָׁאָ֔לוּ <S%H7592><s%> of [them that] asked נִמְצֵ֖אתִי <S%H4672><s%> [for me] I am found לְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> me not בִקְשֻׁ֑נִי <S%H1245><s%> of [them that] sought אָמַ֙רְתִּי֙ <S%H559><s%> I said הִנֵּ֣נִי <S%H2005><s%> behold הִנֵּ֔נִי <S%H2005><s%> behold אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about גּ֖וֹי <S%H1471><s%> Behold me behold me unto a nation לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not קֹרָ֥א <S%H7121><s%> [that] was not called בִשְׁמִֽי׃ <S%H8034><s%> by my name

פֵּרַ֧שְׂתִּי <S%H6566><s%> I have spread out יָדַ֛י <S%H3027><s%> my hands כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַיּ֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> all the day אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about עַ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> people סוֹרֵ֑ר <S%H5637><s%> unto a rebellious הַהֹלְכִים֙ <S%H1980><s%> which walketh הַדֶּ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> in a way לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> is not ט֔וֹב <S%H2896><s%> [that was] not good אַחַ֖ר <S%H310><s%> after מַחְשְׁבֹתֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H4284><s%> their own thoughts

הָעָ֗ם <S%H5971><s%> A people הַמַּכְעִיסִ֥ים <S%H3707><s%> that provoketh me to anger אוֹתִ֛י <S%H853><s%> עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and פָּנַ֖י <S%H6440><s%> to my face תָּמִ֑יד <S%H8548><s%> continually זֹֽבְחִים֙ <S%H2076><s%> that sacrificeth בַּגַּנּ֔וֹת <S%H1593><s%> in gardens וּֽמְקַטְּרִ֖ים <S%H6999><s%> and burneth incense עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הַלְּבֵנִֽים׃ <S%H3843><s%> upon altars of brick

הַיֹּֽשְׁבִים֙ <S%H3427><s%> Which remain בַּקְּבָרִ֔ים <S%H6913><s%> among the graves וּבַנְּצוּרִ֖ים <S%H5341><s%> in the monuments יָלִ֑ינוּ <S%H3885><s%> and lodge הָאֹֽכְלִים֙ <S%H398><s%> which eat בְּשַׂ֣ר <S%H1320><s%> flesh הַחֲזִ֔יר <S%H2386><s%> swine's [וּפְרַק כ] (וּמְרַ֥ק <S%H6564><s%> broth ק) פִּגֻּלִ֖ים <S%H6292><s%> of abominable כְּלֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H3627><s%> [things is in] their vessels

הָאֹֽמְרִים֙ <S%H559><s%> Which say קְרַ֣ב <S%H7126><s%> Stand אֵלֶ֔יךָ <S%H413><s%> about אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּגַּשׁ־ <S%H5066><s%> by thyself come not near בִּ֖י כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> For קְדַשְׁתִּ֑יךָ <S%H6942><s%> to me for I am holier אֵ֚לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These עָשָׁ֣ן <S%H6227><s%> than thou These [are] a smoke בְּאַפִּ֔י <S%H639><s%> in my nose אֵ֥שׁ <S%H784><s%> a fire יֹקֶ֖דֶת <S%H3344><s%> that burneth כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַיּֽוֹם׃ <S%H3117><s%> all the day

הִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold כְתוּבָ֖ה <S%H3789><s%> Behold [it is] written לְפָנָ֑י <S%H6440><s%> before לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> I will not אֶחֱשֶׂה֙ <S%H2814><s%> me I will not keep silence כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> but שִׁלַּ֔מְתִּי <S%H7999><s%> but will recompense וְשִׁלַּמְתִּ֖י <S%H7999><s%> even recompense עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> into חֵיקָֽם׃ <S%H2436><s%> into their bosom

עֲ֠וֹנֹתֵיכֶם <S%H5771><s%> Your iniquities וַעֲוֹנֹ֨ת <S%H5771><s%> and the iniquities אֲבוֹתֵיכֶ֤ם <S%H1><s%> of your fathers יַחְדָּו֙ <S%H3162><s%> together אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> Because קִטְּרוּ֙ <S%H6999><s%> which have burned incense עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הֶ֣הָרִ֔ים <S%H2022><s%> upon the mountains וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הַגְּבָע֖וֹת <S%H1389><s%> me upon the hills חֵרְפ֑וּנִי <S%H2778><s%> and blasphemed וּמַדֹּתִ֧י <S%H4058><s%> therefore will I measure פְעֻלָּתָ֛ם <S%H6468><s%> work רִֽאשֹׁנָ֖ה <S%H7223><s%> their former [עַל־ כ] (אֶל־ <S%H5921><s%> and חֵיקָֽם׃ <S%H413><s%> about ק) ס

כֹּ֣ה ׀ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> after יִמָּצֵ֤א <S%H4672><s%> is found הַתִּירוֹשׁ֙ <S%H8492><s%> As the new wine בָּֽאֶשְׁכּ֔וֹל <S%H811><s%> in the cluster וְאָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> and [one] saith אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תַּשְׁחִיתֵ֔הוּ <S%H7843><s%> Destroy כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> there בְרָכָ֖ה <S%H1293><s%> it not for a blessing בּ֑וֹ כֵּ֤ן <S%H3651><s%> So אֶֽעֱשֶׂה֙ <S%H6213><s%> [is] in it so will I do לְמַ֣עַן <S%H4616><s%> behalf עֲבָדַ֔י <S%H5650><s%> for my servants' לְבִלְתִּ֖י <S%H1115><s%> not הַֽשְׁחִ֥ית <S%H7843><s%> sakes that I may not destroy הַכֹּֽל׃ <S%H3605><s%> all

וְהוֹצֵאתִ֤י <S%H3318><s%> And I will bring forth מִֽיַּעֲקֹב֙ <S%H3290><s%> out of Jacob זֶ֔רַע <S%H2233><s%> a seed וּמִיהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> and out of Judah יוֹרֵ֣שׁ <S%H3423><s%> an inheritor הָרָ֑י <S%H2022><s%> of my mountains וִירֵשׁ֣וּהָ <S%H3423><s%> shall inherit בְחִירַ֔י <S%H972><s%> and mine elect וַעֲבָדַ֖י <S%H5650><s%> it and my servants יִשְׁכְּנוּ־ <S%H7931><s%> shall dwell שָֽׁמָּה׃ <S%H8033><s%> there

וְהָיָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> become הַשָּׁרוֹן֙ <S%H8289><s%> And Sharon לִנְוֵה־ <S%H5116><s%> shall be a fold צֹ֔אן <S%H6629><s%> of flocks וְעֵ֥מֶק <S%H6010><s%> and the valley עָכ֖וֹר <S%H5911><s%> of Achor לְרֵ֣בֶץ <S%H7258><s%> to lie down in בָּקָ֑ר <S%H1241><s%> a place for the herds לְעַמִּ֖י <S%H5971><s%> for my people אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who דְּרָשֽׁוּנִי׃ <S%H1875><s%> that have sought

וְאַתֶּם֙ <S%H859><s%> who עֹזְבֵ֣י <S%H5800><s%> But ye [are] they that forsake יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD הַשְּׁכֵחִ֖ים <S%H7911><s%> cause to forget אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַ֣ר <S%H2022><s%> mountain קָדְשִׁ֑י <S%H6944><s%> my holy הַֽעֹרְכִ֤ים <S%H6186><s%> that prepare לַגַּד֙ <S%H1409><s%> Fortune שֻׁלְחָ֔ן <S%H7979><s%> a table וְהַֽמְמַלְאִ֖ים <S%H4390><s%> and that furnish לַמְנִ֥י <S%H4507><s%> unto that number מִמְסָֽךְ׃ <S%H4469><s%> the drink offering

וּמָנִ֨יתִי <S%H4487><s%> Therefore will I number אֶתְכֶ֜ם <S%H853><s%> לַחֶ֗רֶב <S%H2719><s%> you to the sword וְכֻלְּכֶם֙ <S%H3605><s%> and all לַטֶּ֣בַח <S%H2874><s%> to the slaughter תִּכְרָ֔עוּ <S%H3766><s%> and ye shall all bow down יַ֤עַן <S%H3282><s%> Because קָרָ֙אתִי֙ <S%H7121><s%> because when I called וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> did not עֲנִיתֶ֔ם <S%H6030><s%> ye did not answer דִּבַּ֖רְתִּי <S%H1696><s%> when I spake וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> did not שְׁמַעְתֶּ֑ם <S%H8085><s%> ye did not hear וַתַּעֲשׂ֤וּ <S%H6213><s%> but did הָרַע֙ <S%H7451><s%> evil בְּעֵינַ֔י <S%H5869><s%> before mine eyes וּבַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not חָפַ֖צְתִּי <S%H2654><s%> [that] wherein I delighted בְּחַרְתֶּֽם׃ <S%H977><s%> and did choose פ

לָכֵ֞ן <S%H3651><s%> Therefore כֹּה־ <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַ֣ר ׀ <S%H559><s%> Therefore thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֗ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD הִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold עֲבָדַ֤י ׀ <S%H5650><s%> Behold my servants יֹאכֵ֙לוּ֙ <S%H398><s%> shall eat וְאַתֶּ֣ם <S%H859><s%> you תִּרְעָ֔בוּ <S%H7456><s%> but ye shall be hungry הִנֵּ֧ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold עֲבָדַ֛י <S%H5650><s%> behold my servants יִשְׁתּ֖וּ <S%H8354><s%> shall drink וְאַתֶּ֣ם <S%H859><s%> you תִּצְמָ֑אוּ <S%H6770><s%> but ye shall be thirsty הִנֵּ֧ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold עֲבָדַ֛י <S%H5650><s%> behold my servants יִשְׂמָ֖חוּ <S%H8055><s%> shall rejoice וְאַתֶּ֥ם <S%H859><s%> you תֵּבֹֽשׁוּ׃ <S%H954><s%> but ye shall be ashamed

הִנֵּ֧ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold עֲבָדַ֛י <S%H5650><s%> Behold my servants יָרֹ֖נּוּ <S%H7442><s%> shall sing מִטּ֣וּב <S%H2898><s%> for joy לֵ֑ב <S%H3820><s%> of heart וְאַתֶּ֤ם <S%H859><s%> you תִּצְעֲקוּ֙ <S%H6817><s%> but ye shall cry מִכְּאֵ֣ב <S%H3511><s%> for sorrow לֵ֔ב <S%H3820><s%> of heart וּמִשֵּׁ֥בֶר <S%H7667><s%> for vexation ר֖וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> of spirit תְּיֵלִֽילוּ׃ <S%H3213><s%> and shall howl

וְהִנַּחְתֶּ֨ם <S%H3240><s%> And ye shall leave שִׁמְכֶ֤ם <S%H8034><s%> your name לִשְׁבוּעָה֙ <S%H7621><s%> for a curse לִבְחִירַ֔י <S%H972><s%> unto my chosen וֶהֱמִיתְךָ֖ <S%H4191><s%> shall slay אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> for the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD וְלַעֲבָדָ֥יו <S%H5650><s%> his servants יִקְרָ֖א <S%H7121><s%> thee and call שֵׁ֥ם <S%H8034><s%> name אַחֵֽר׃ <S%H312><s%> by another

אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> Because הַמִּתְבָּרֵ֜ךְ <S%H1288><s%> That he who blesseth בָּאָ֗רֶץ <S%H776><s%> himself in the earth יִתְבָּרֵךְ֙ <S%H1288><s%> shall bless בֵּאלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> himself in the God אָמֵ֔ן <S%H543><s%> of truth וְהַנִּשְׁבָּ֣ע <S%H7650><s%> and he that sweareth בָּאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the earth יִשָּׁבַ֖ע <S%H7650><s%> shall swear בֵּאלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> by the God אָמֵ֑ן <S%H543><s%> of truth כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> Because נִשְׁכְּח֗וּ <S%H7911><s%> are forgotten הַצָּרוֹת֙ <S%H6869><s%> troubles הָרִ֣אשֹׁנ֔וֹת <S%H7223><s%> because the former וְכִ֥י <S%H3588><s%> and because נִסְתְּר֖וּ <S%H5641><s%> and because they are hid מֵעֵינָֽי׃ <S%H5869><s%> from mine eyes

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for הִנְנִ֥י <S%H2005><s%> behold בוֹרֵ֛א <S%H1254><s%> For behold I create שָׁמַ֥יִם <S%H8064><s%> heavens חֲדָשִׁ֖ים <S%H2319><s%> new וָאָ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> earth חֲדָשָׁ֑ה <S%H2319><s%> and a new וְלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> not תִזָּכַ֙רְנָה֙ <S%H2142><s%> shall not be remembered הָרִ֣אשֹׁנ֔וֹת <S%H7223><s%> and the former וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> or תַעֲלֶ֖ינָה <S%H5927><s%> nor come עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto לֵֽב׃ <S%H3820><s%> into mind כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> but

שִׂ֤ישׂוּ <S%H7797><s%> But be ye glad וְגִ֙ילוּ֙ <S%H1523><s%> and rejoice עֲדֵי־ <S%H5703><s%> for ever עַ֔ד <S%H5704><s%> in אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> what אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I בוֹרֵ֑א <S%H1254><s%> [in that] which I create כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> for הִנְנִ֨י <S%H2005><s%> behold בוֹרֵ֧א <S%H1254><s%> for behold I create אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְרוּשָׁלִַ֛ם <S%H3389><s%> Jerusalem גִּילָ֖ה <S%H1525><s%> a rejoicing וְעַמָּ֥הּ <S%H5971><s%> and her people מָשֽׂוֹשׂ׃ <S%H4885><s%> a joy

וְגַלְתִּ֥י <S%H1523><s%> And I will rejoice בִירוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <S%H3389><s%> in Jerusalem וְשַׂשְׂתִּ֣י <S%H7797><s%> and joy בְעַמִּ֑י <S%H5971><s%> in my people וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> will no יִשָּׁמַ֥ע <S%H8085><s%> shall be no more heard בָּהּ֙ ע֔וֹד <S%H5750><s%> longer ק֥וֹל <S%H6963><s%> and the voice בְּכִ֖י <S%H1065><s%> of weeping וְק֥וֹל <S%H6963><s%> in her nor the voice זְעָקָֽה׃ <S%H2201><s%> of crying
